title: Cup And  Saucer, "Blue Flowers", 1960–70
markings: underside of cup and saucer: Lomonosov "LFZ" mark stamped in orange overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Cup has straight flaring sides, loop handle; painted with blue and gilded flowers. Saucer is circular, painted with wide border of similar blue and gilded flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cup And  Saucer, "Blue Flowers", 1960–70.
1960–70. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-105-a,b.
